short_summary: The Canadian Food Inspection Agency is seeking task-based professional services on an as-needed basis. The contract will be awarded to up to two (2) contractors. The proposed contract period is from contract award to one year later, with the option to extend the contract for two (2) one-year option periods under the same terms and conditions.
description: The Canadian Food Inspection Agency has a requirement for task-based professional services on an as-needed basis. It is intended to award up to two (2) contract(s). The proposed period of contract shall be from contract award to one year later with the option to extend the contract for two (2) one year option periods under the same terms and conditions.
full_summary:
# Task-Based Professional Services (TSPS) Tender Announcement

## Overview

The [Canadian Food Inspection Agency](https://inspection.gc.ca/) invites eligible bidders to submit a proposal for Task-Based Professional Services (TSPS) to support business consulting, facilitation, and implementation of projects and programs. This procurement has been conditionally set aside under the Federal Government's [Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/public_tenders/tbs-dioc/index_eng.asp?sfd-currentPage=change-language_MA)

## Tender Details

### Reference Number
PW-22-01011631

### Tender Number
2023-00424/A

### Publication Date
October 27, 2022

### Closing Date
December 1, 2022, 14:00:00 (local time)
 
### Description
The successful Bidder will be responsible for delivering TSPS on an as-needed basis, with a proposed contract period of one year, with the option to extend the contract for two additional one-year periods.

### Eligibility
This requirement is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who qualified under Tier 1 for the following category: Stream 2: Business Consulting / Change Management, and Layers within the Stream.

### Classification
Business Services (GSIN: R019E)

### Location
National Capital Region (NCR)

### Attachment
The [Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/27/050bd2cd1646f97f037498d1aaf2c657/2023-00424_npp_eng.pdf) is available for download.

### Language of Preference
The language of preference for this solicitation is English.

## Notification

The Contracting Authority reserves the right to refuse any bid and to waive any informalities or irregularities in any bids. No references or outside endorsements will be considered during the evaluation process.

### Contact Information

Name
JoAnne Cassidy
Email
[joanne.cassidy@inspection.gc.ca](mailto:joanne.cassidy@inspection.gc.ca)
Note: All questions, bids, and documentation must be sent electronically to the [buyer](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/public_tenders/tbs-dioc/find_validate_TendersEng).

### Closing Date and Time

December 1, 2022, at 14:00:00
